name: Jeremy Jones
about: I am a full stack developer based in Nashville. I enjoy creating fantastic user-facing web applications, as well as writing developer-friendly APIs. I have a passion for MVC frameworks, and JavaScript-heavy apps. Lately I've been doing a lot of AngularJS and Node. I'm inspired by simplicity and beautiful, elegant code. When I'm not making a living, I enjoy traveling, participating in Hackathons, video games, and some creative coding.

resume.summary: Web developer with over 4 years of project experience.  Familiar with server side and client side development.  Team oriented, agile developer.  Problem solver.  Generalist.  Polyglot.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Senior developer on numerous client projects using a variety of technology stacks including Asp.Net MVC, Ruby on Rails, and AngularJS.  Responsible for architecture, development, deployment, and maintenance.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Developer responsible for contributing to multiple simultaneous client projects.  Wrote applications for various platforms, including mobile, web, and enterprise.  Responsible for making technical and design decisions collaboratively in an agile environment.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Lead developer on a web-based graphics engine for simulation and training written in JavaScript and built WebGL and Three.js.

accolades: Finalist at HackNashville6 on the NashvesTN project

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
